body: A huge manor housing a rich family and its servants.
name: Mansion
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Buildings And Organizations/Buildings and Organizations/Buildings/Mansion
rooms: 1 Bar, 1 Bath, 4 Bedrooms, 1 Escape Route, 2 Furnishings (Bedroom and Sitting Room), 1 Kitchen, 1 Laundry, 1 Lavatory, 1 Lodging, 1 Office, 1 Secret Room, 2 Sitting Rooms, 1 Stall, 2 Storages
